heading: Tormented Ruins Dungeon Guide
content: Tormented Ruins will be familiar to you, as it is located in the same place as the first tutorial dungeon in the game. It offers an early resource aspect for Druid, the and has a decent clear time. Overall it's not too bad should you need to run it multiple times, or otherwise just complete it once for the Renown and Codex of Power rewards. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
